arts.ttl: 'Well worthy': Scott Parker's immediate reaction to Burnley's FA Cup win against Southampton
arts.sum: Scott Parker was delighted with the way his much-changed Burnley side went about their business during their hard-earned FA Cup win against Southampton.

arts.ttl: Burnley player ratings as 'superb' 8/10 handed out following FA Cup win against Southampton - gallery
arts.sum: Burnley booked their spot in the fifth round of the FA Cup with a well-earned 1-0 win against Premier League side Southampton.

arts.ttl: Marcus Edwards nets winner on debut as Burnley dump Southampton out of FA Cup
arts.sum: Burnley kept their 23rd clean sheet of the season.

arts.ttl: Burnley team news vs Southampton as Scott Parker makes 8 changes for FA Cup tie
arts.sum: Scott Parker has named a strong Burnley side for today’s FA Cup tie against Southampton despite making eight changes from their midweek league win.

arts.ttl: Player says he’s living Leeds United dream – Not defensive like Sheffield United and Burnley
arts.sum: Leeds United, Burnley and Sheffield United are in contention for direct promotion to the Premier League. Daniel Farke’s side are leading the Championship table with 66 points, five points ahead of Burnley and Sheffield United who are in second and third spot respectively. arts.ttl: 'Opportunity': Scott Parker drops selection hint for Burnley's FA Cup tie against Southampton
arts.sum: Scott Parker is expected to rotate his Burnley side for today’s FA Cup tie against Southampton.

arts.ttl: Southampton v Burnley: Team news, predicted teams and TV details for FA Cup fourth round tie
arts.sum: Burnley take a brief break from their Championship promotion charge when they face Premier League strugglers Southampton in the FA Cup.

arts.ttl: 'Badges on our chest': Scott Parker peels the curtain behind Burnley's 'best defence in Europe'
arts.sum: Scott Parker believes the togetherness and team spirit among his Burnley squad is a major factor behind them boasting the best defensive record in Europe.

arts.ttl: Approach to Southampton for PL side’s new signing – Saints keen on sanctioning move
arts.sum: On winter deadline day, Southampton completed the signing of Victor Udoh from Royal Antwerp. The Saints confirmed the 20-year-old will initially be part of the English club’s U21 side. The forward arrived at Southampton after playing 300 minutes from 28 matches for the Belgian club’s senior team.
